full_summary:
**EMC Hardware and Software Maintenance and Support for DND**

### Tender Announcement

Reference Number: SSC-23-00020798:T
Amendment Number: 2
Solicitation Number: BPM017396/20798

### Description

The Department of National Defence (DND) in Ottawa, Ontario is seeking a supplier to provide EMC Hardware Maintenance and Support, as well as EMC Software Maintenance and Support, in accordance with the attached Request for Quotations (RFQ).

### Contract Details

* Contracting Entity: Shared Services Canada
* End User Entity: DND
* Contracting Authority: Agnes Kowalska
* Contact Information:
	+ Email: [agnes.kowalska2@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:agnes.kowalska2@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
	+ Phone: 343-551-9034
	+ Fax: Not available
	+ Address: 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, Ontario K1G 4A8

### Tender Requirements

The bidder must submit a compliant bid with all required documents and information. The bid must comply with all requirements of the bid solicitation to be declared responsive. The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of a contract.

### Additional Information

Due to COVID-19 pandemic, suppliers are required to submit bids electronically using the Contracting Authority's email. Faxed and hard copy bids will not be accepted, except in exceptional circumstances.

### Notice

This solicitation is for services, not goods. Suppliers are expected to refer to the Request for Quotations document for complete details regarding this requirement, including the mandatory criteria, evaluation criteria, and basis of selection.

### Cancellation Notice

This solicitation was previously expired. However, by virtue of Amendment 002, this solicitation is still active and remains open for bidding.

### Trade Agreements

This solicitation is open to suppliers who are registered under the following trade agreements:

* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive
